text: tse nadto bahato zdyvuvannya dlya lyudey shcho my nadykhayetʹsya lyudyna lyubymo yikh? Vin (buv nadykhnutyy shchob skazaty), "Vy budete poperedyty lyudey, ta budete daty harna novyna tsym khto vvazhayutʹ, shcho vony dosyahnuly pozytsiyi prominence u yikhnʹomu Lordi." disbelievers skazalo, "Tse ye rozumnyy charivnyk
